ClassDesc: This wear-specific implementation of @B_android#support#v7#widget#LinearLayoutManager_E@ provides basic offsetting logic for updating child layout. For round devices it offsets the children horizontally to make them appear to travel around a circle. For square devices it aligns them in a straight list. This functionality is provided by the @B_android#support#wear#widget#CurvingLayoutCallback_E@ which is set when constructing the this class with its default constructor @B_android#support#wear#widget#WearableLinearLayoutManager#WearableLinearLayoutManager_E@.
